pluginstrument.author: SIMSTRUMENTATION
pluginstrument.description:
CJ4 Controls Panel See here for contact info and notes: http://simstrumentation.com
Touch the hinges on the Engine Run/Stop buttons in order to open the covers. You cannot operate the buttons with the covers closed.
Secondary Elev Trim is inop.
Ambient back lighting is only supported while using the SIMSTRUMENTATON Ambient Light Dimmer control.
